infos.value: Muraga, that rat... Did he really head for Leonis?
I saw it with my own eyes, and yet I struggle to believe it...
Rairyuu was one of Gouga’s best shinobi.
Taking him out in one hit like that...
We should've taken Muraga more seriously.
This is bad, real bad! There's no one left who can beat Muraga now!
Even so, we can’t just do nothing.
Hold on, now. You're not thinking of going after him, are you?
And you're not? Maybe I'm missing something here. I thought you were Rairyuu’s partner...
Am I? I don’t remember partnering up with any corpse.
That’s harsh, aye!
Still...you have one thing right. We can’t just do nothing.
...Do we go after him?
You think Muraga and his lot alone are enough to stop the combined forces of Leonis and Hourne?
I’d wager they are.
So there’s nothing the three of us can do to get back at him?
That all depends on whether Sadali is with him or not. Aye?
Wait, don't you mean "Lord Sadali"?
Uh-oh...
Well, I suppose my oath of devotion to the Church wasn't set in stone, either.
...Can we trust you on that?
Yeah. Sadali’s pets are "Murmur", "Whisper", and "Grace".
Oh, and Sterne or whatever that kid from Leonis was called.
You think I’d fit in with those guys?
Sounds like you’ve got it pretty rough, too, aye.
Anyway...as I was saying...
If Sadali is at Leonis Castle...what would happen if we didn't show up?
He might think...that we turned tail and ran like cowards.
And if he isn’t there...?
Then I would see no reason to risk our necks.
...Either way, it's looking like a trip to Leonis is in store.
Looks like it.
Let’s go see what Sadali and Muraga get up to for ourselves, aye!
So long, Rairyuu.
I’m sorry it ended up like this. But whenever I eat something good, I'll make sure to eat enough for you, too.
